betterquesting.name: #Poundtheground
betterquesting.desc: Pound the ground to gain pebbles (this only works in the botania Garden of Glass) and craft cobblestone.

betterquesting.name: Random Act of Kindness
betterquesting.desc: A gift from the Titan Council to you.

betterquesting.name: Begin Again
betterquesting.desc: Begin by collecting wood, Crooks can be used for silk worms and collecting a bit more saplings than normal.

betterquesting.name: The Sieve
betterquesting.desc: Craft a sieve to begin the siege of sieving montages. Can hammer down compressed cobblestone all the way down to compressed dust.

betterquesting.name: Sieving Montage I
betterquesting.desc: Sieving dirt can give you different types of seeds you may find useful.

betterquesting.name: Sieving Montage II
betterquesting.desc: Grow these then make juice out of them will keep you from going hungry, well until you want something more filling.

betterquesting.name: Cobble Gen
betterquesting.desc: Generate cobblestone by placing the transfer node on the cobblestone between the water and lava then insert World interaction upgrade.

betterquesting.name: Lava Generation!
betterquesting.desc: Generate Lava through melting cobblestone in a crucible (need to melt 4-5 cobblestone for a full bucket) and you can melt ender lilly seeds for resonant ender.

betterquesting.name: Sieving Montage III
betterquesting.desc: Sieve gravel for items unobtainable by other sievable materials.

betterquesting.name: Sieving Montage IV
betterquesting.desc: Sieve sand for items unobtainable by other sievable materials.

betterquesting.name: Sieving Montage V
betterquesting.desc: Sieve dust for items unobtainable by other sievable materials.

betterquesting.name: Burning Power!
betterquesting.desc: Very inefficient power source in terms of speed but its a start. Maybe upgrade to a stirling generator later.

betterquesting.name: Automatic Sieving!
betterquesting.desc: Title says it all.

betterquesting.name: Iron Chest
betterquesting.desc: Upgrade-able chests

betterquesting.name: Coke Oven
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Hemp!
betterquesting.desc: May harvest hemp seeds by breaking grass. Can grow grass through bone mealing grass blocks. May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Gotta Go Deeper!
betterquesting.desc: The Nether filled with dangers known to take you down.

betterquesting.name: Treated Wood!
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Water Power!
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Learning to Tinker!
betterquesting.desc: Make your first tool out of tool parts. Recommend starting with using wood and flint or just plastic.

betterquesting.name: Tinkering With Metals!
betterquesting.desc: The Smeltery is a multi-block construct requiring you to have at least 84 Seared Bricks, or 19 Seared Brick blocks, a Smeltery Controller, and either a seared Tank, Seared Window, or Seared Glass. The Smeltery can be any rectangular shape up to 7 blocks per side. Becareful of mixing metals unless you mean to do so.

betterquesting.name: Mob Farm!
betterquesting.desc: Setup a mob farm to begin the onslaught for sweet loots. Recommend being atleast 24 blocks away from your base although bloodmoons will help. Warning: Lapis Lamps do not affect mob spawning so mobs will still spawn despite the light level these give off, also cursed earth doesn't burn with these lamps.

betterquesting.name: Behead The Head!
betterquesting.desc: Collect 3 Wither Skulls from Withers skeletons from the Nether or by pouring Witch Water on normal skeletons.

betterquesting.name: Mob Hunter
betterquesting.desc: Kill Blazes, Magma Cubes and Flame Spiders.

betterquesting.name: Gears!
betterquesting.desc: Used to make gears.

betterquesting.name: Wither Boss!
betterquesting.desc: Simple, kill the Wither Boss however be aware of the Hardcore Wither mod.

betterquesting.name: Power Cables!
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Connectors and Relays!
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Thermo Power
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: LMH Capacitors
betterquesting.desc: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

betterquesting.name: Sieving Montage VI
betterquesting.desc: Hammer down Netherrack for crushed Netherrack in order to obtain gold 100% of the time. Quartz from Soul Sand.

betterquesting.desc: Surrond one tungsten with 8 coal.

betterquesting.name: LMH Wires
betterquesting.desc: Same idea as Immersive Engineering for power manipulation.

betterquesting.name: Wind Turbines
betterquesting.desc: Bigger is better (in this case).

betterquesting.desc: This will be made more than once due to the 400 rf/t limit it has.

betterquesting.desc: To make you aware this is a thing.

betterquesting.name: Wooden Spikes
betterquesting.desc: Will take mobs down to half heart but won't kill them.

betterquesting.name: Iron Spikes
betterquesting.desc: Mobs will die from this, but won't drop experience.

betterquesting.name: Gold Spikes
betterquesting.desc: Mobs will die from this.

betterquesting.name: Diamond Spikes
betterquesting.desc: Mobs will die from this and will drop rare items and experiance. Is enchantable.

betterquesting.name: Trash Can
betterquesting.desc: Void items you won't use.

betterquesting.name: Trash Can (Fluid)
betterquesting.desc: Void liquids that you won't use.

betterquesting.name: Trash Can (Energy)
betterquesting.desc: Why use this exactly?

betterquesting.name: QED
betterquesting.desc: Used to make upgrades, items and the assembly table.

betterquesting.name: Transfer Node Upgrades
betterquesting.desc: Transfer node upgrades.

betterquesting.name: Extra Crystals
betterquesting.desc: Causes the QED to run faster.

betterquesting.name: Lazered Assembly
betterquesting.desc: Used for TE machines and the Dire crafting table.

betterquesting.name: Division Sigil
betterquesting.desc: Found as dungeon loot or killing specific bosses.

betterquesting.name: Division Sigil (Activated)
betterquesting.desc: To activate it, place an Enchantment Table on a Grass Block with a clear view of the sky, in total darkness, surround it with 8 Redstone Dust (also placed on Grass), and wait until midnight. Once the time is right, the sigil will begin glowing in the inventory (the way a tool does when imbued with an enchant), at this point killing any mob standing on the altar will activate all sigils in the inventory, each can be used 256 times.

betterquesting.name: Pseudo Inversion Sigil
betterquesting.desc: After being activated once, the Division Sigil can be activated again to transform into a Pseudo-Inversion Sigil, a ritual significantly more complicated than the first activation, which can only be performed in the End dimension. It is highly advised to defeat the Dragon prior to starting the ritual, but not necessary. The ritual is performed by placing a Beacon in the centre of a flat area of at least 1111, not necessarily on End Stone, then place a chest in each of the cardinal directions leaving 4 spaces empty between the chest and the Beacon.                                  A spiral pattern of Redstone and String is then laid out around the beacon. At any time, Shift+Right-clicking the Beacon with an Activated Division Sigil in hand will show the building progress of the ritual. Finally, kill an Iron Golem while it stands within the ritual area to activate the process. If it works, there will be an explosion that destroys the beacon and chests, while every Enderman in the End vanishes. During the ritual, throngs of aggresive mobs imbued with Haste will begin spawning and attacking the Player who needs to kill a 100 of them to complete the ritual. If the Player dies or leave the dimension, the ritual will fail and will have to be started over. Once enough mobs have been killed, the first activated Sigil in the inventory will stabilize. The Pseudo-Inversion Sigil can be used an unlimited number of times, and dividing an Iron Ingot by Diamond will produce Mobius "Unstable-Stable" Ingot which does not explode, can be produced in any crafting interface and will stack up to 64.

betterquesting.name: Cursed Earth
betterquesting.desc: Spawns mobs very quickly and at any distance you are from it. Will burn if revealed to light sources.

betterquesting.name: Unstable Ingots
betterquesting.desc: Unstable ingots crafted from semi stable nuggets won't explode after 10 seconds.

betterquesting.name: Angel Wings
betterquesting.desc: Allows you to fly and take no fall damage.

betterquesting.name: Endo Pump
betterquesting.desc: Pumps liquids to put into tanks.

betterquesting.name: Endo Quarry
betterquesting.desc: A mining machine that extracts resources from the ground and replaces it with dirt. There are two ways to set-up the mining area: Outlining the area with Fence, and placing the Quarry in the fence line or using Ender-Markers at the corners and placing the Quarry next to one of the Markers.

betterquesting.name: Mobius Unstable/Stable Ingot
betterquesting.desc: Can be crafted normal with the pseudo inversion sigil which won't explode at all.

betterquesting.name: Angel Block
betterquesting.desc: This block can be placed in the air itself.

betterquesting.name: Chipsets
betterquesting.desc: Crafting components.

betterquesting.name: Combustion Engine
betterquesting.desc: Produces power with gasoline fuel and water as coolant.

betterquesting.name: Open The Flood Gates!
betterquesting.desc: Can place fluid down however don't use too many of these at once or you will suffer from memory leaks.

betterquesting.name: Quarry Upgraded
betterquesting.desc: Upgrades for the ender quarry.

betterquesting.name: Iron Drum
betterquesting.desc: 256 buckets of any liquid.

betterquesting.name: Magical Wood
betterquesting.desc: The better the enchants the more magical wood you'll get.

betterquesting.name: Bedrockium
betterquesting.desc: Crafted/smelted with a certain amount of compressed cobblestone.

betterquesting.name: To The Core!
betterquesting.desc: A cave world that has darkness itself to help defend its richest.

betterquesting.name: Beyond The Core!
betterquesting.desc: A void world that is shared between all players that is always night.

betterquesting.name: Logic Pipes
betterquesting.desc: Logistics Pipes allows one to build an advanced logistics network using a number of new pipes. Provider Logistics Pipes are used to provide and send items into the system upon demand from other pipes, either automatic ones such as the Supplier Logistics Pipe, or player-controlled ones like the Request Logistics Pipe. It is also possible to have items crafted automatically when necessary using Crafting Logistics Pipes. A special kind of pipes are the Logistics Chassis, which can hold modules that give the chassis certain abilities. These modules are often equivalent in function to another logistics pipe, making it possible to combine multiple pipes' functionality into a single one. Liquids can also be handled by the logistics network, using Logistics Fluid Pipes.

betterquesting.name: Storage Drawers
betterquesting.desc: Easier organizing all your ores that you sieve.

betterquesting.name: Storage Upgrade
betterquesting.desc: Upgrades the amount of items storage drawers can hold.

betterquesting.name: Food Gen
betterquesting.desc: Produce power through the type of food you put in it.

betterquesting.name: Foodstuffs Gen
betterquesting.desc: Produce power through the type of food you put in it.

betterquesting.name: Cuisine Gen
betterquesting.desc: Produce power through the type of food you put in it.

betterquesting.name: Transfer Energy
betterquesting.desc: Allows transfer pipes to transfer energy.

betterquesting.name: Transfer Hypu Energy

betterquesting.name: Enhanced Builder's Wand

betterquesting.name: Resonant Cell

betterquesting.name: Vibrant Alloy

betterquesting.name: Flux Bank Tier 2
betterquesting.desc: A multiblockish energy storage that can cause a bit of lag if energy is constantly going in/out and if there is a lot of them.

betterquesting.name: Flux Bank Tier 3
betterquesting.desc: A multiblockish energy storage that can cause a bit of lag if energy is constantly going in/out and if there is a lot of them.

betterquesting.name: Photo Cell II
betterquesting.desc: Collects sunlight to produce power.

betterquesting.name: Electrical Alloy

betterquesting.name: Pulsating Iron

betterquesting.name: Dark Steel

betterquesting.name: Soul-Infused Alloy

betterquesting.name: Dimensional Transciever
betterquesting.desc: Transfers items, liquids, and power.

betterquesting.name: Slice'N'Splice

betterquesting.name: Soul Binder

betterquesting.name: Enchanted Crystals

betterquesting.name: Tormented Heads

betterquesting.name: Wireless Charger

betterquesting.name: Reservoir
betterquesting.desc: Two buckets of water makes this an infinite water source.

betterquesting.name: Invar
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Ferrous/Nickel and Iron.

betterquesting.name: Tinkers' Alloy
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Tin and Copper.

betterquesting.name: Electrum
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Gold and Silver.

betterquesting.name: Signal Ingot
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Redstone, silver, and Copper.

betterquesting.name: Lumium
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Glowstone, Tin, and Silver.

betterquesting.name: Enderium
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Platinum/Shiny, Resonant Ender, Tin and Silver.

betterquesting.name: Leadstone Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 1 Thermal Expansion based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Hardened Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 2 Thermal Expansion based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Reinforced Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 3 Thermal Expansion based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Resonant Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 4 Thermal Expansion based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Flux-Infused Jetplate
betterquesting.desc: Top-tier Thermal Expansion based Jetplate.

betterquesting.name: Conductive Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 1 Ender IO based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Electrical Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 2 Ender IO based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Energized Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 3 Ender IO based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Vibrant Jetpack
betterquesting.desc: Tier 4 Ender IO based Jetpack.

betterquesting.name: Dark-Infused Jetplate
betterquesting.desc: Top-tier Ender IO based Jetplate.

betterquesting.name: Glowstonic Ingot
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Electrical Steeland Glowstone.

betterquesting.name: Vibrantium
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Enticing Crystals, Vibrant Alloy and Soularium.

betterquesting.name: Phytogenetic Insolation
betterquesting.desc: Can Produce more crops with RF, Sunlight, and Fertilizer/ Rich Fertilizer.

betterquesting.name: CONNNNNN!
betterquesting.desc: Conduits that can be fitted into one block space up to 5.

betterquesting.name: XP Obelisk
betterquesting.desc: Stores large amounts of experience.

betterquesting.name: Weather Obelisk
betterquesting.desc: Weather manipulation.

betterquesting.name: Leadstone Fluxduct
betterquesting.desc: 2000 RF transfer rate.

betterquesting.name: Hardened Fluxduct
betterquesting.desc: 8000 RF transfer rate.

betterquesting.name: Redstone Fluxduct
betterquesting.desc: 80000 RF transfer rate.

betterquesting.name: Resonant Fluxduct
betterquesting.desc: 320000 RF transfer rate.

betterquesting.name: Cryo-Stabilized Fluxduct
betterquesting.desc: Infinite RF transfer rate.

betterquesting.name: Flux-Infused Electrum
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed using Electrum, Pyrotheum and Redstone.

betterquesting.name: Flux Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Acrystal made from adding Redstone to a Diamond.

betterquesting.name: Compressed Iron
betterquesting.desc: Blow up iron to compress it into compressed iron. You won't get all the iron back however.

betterquesting.name: Pressure Chamber
betterquesting.desc: 3x3x3 Multiblock structure with a hollow center.

betterquesting.name: Plastic Maker
betterquesting.desc: Makes plastic.

betterquesting.name: Refine
betterquesting.desc: Refines oil into liquid plastic. Most efficient use 4 of these.

betterquesting.name: Plastic Mixer
betterquesting.desc: Used to turn plastic into different colors.

betterquesting.name: Transisters
betterquesting.desc: Pneumatic component.

betterquesting.name: Circuit Breaker
betterquesting.desc: The Making of the PCB. Pneumatic component.

betterquesting.name: Pressurized Capacitor
betterquesting.desc: Pneumatic component.

betterquesting.name: Casings
betterquesting.desc: Used for Mekanism machines.

betterquesting.name: Metallurgic
betterquesting.desc: Used to make Mekanism Alloys, Circuits, and biofuel. Can also make steel from enriching iron with coal twice.

betterquesting.name: Enriched Upgrade
betterquesting.desc: Redstone infused iron.

betterquesting.name: Elite Alloy
betterquesting.desc: Diamond infused enriched alloy.

betterquesting.name: Ultimate Alloy
betterquesting.desc: Refined Obsidian dust infused reinforced alloy.

betterquesting.name: Enrichment Chamber
betterquesting.desc: Can turn a few items back to their original state such as certus quartz dust back into certus quartz.

betterquesting.name: Enriched Redstone
betterquesting.desc: More efficient for Metallurgic Infuser.

betterquesting.name: Enriched Diamond
betterquesting.desc: More efficient for Metallurgic Infuser.

betterquesting.name: Enriched Obsidian
betterquesting.desc: More efficient for Metallurgic Infuser.

betterquesting.name: Osmium Compressor
betterquesting.desc: Use Osmium to infuse Refined Obsidian dust into Refined Obsidian Ingots.

betterquesting.name: Refined Obsidian
betterquesting.desc: Need an Osmium compressor and Metallurgic infuser.

betterquesting.name: Combiner
betterquesting.desc: Combines stone with metals to remake the ore.

betterquesting.name: Basic
betterquesting.desc: Mekanism's pipes and cables.

betterquesting.name: Advance
betterquesting.desc: Mekanism's pipes and cables.

betterquesting.name: Elite
betterquesting.desc: Mekanism's pipes and cables.

betterquesting.name: Ultimate
betterquesting.desc: Mekanism's pipes and cables.

betterquesting.name: Heat Generator
betterquesting.desc: Press shift and M (default keybinds) to see what these machines can do.

betterquesting.name: Rotten Power
betterquesting.desc: Power generation through biofuel.

betterquesting.name: Smashing
betterquesting.desc: Crushes ores to their dust counterparts.

betterquesting.name: Robit Miner
betterquesting.desc: Faster and better than a Quarry.

betterquesting.name: Turbine Power
betterquesting.desc: Produces power through wind current.

betterquesting.name: Solar Panel
betterquesting.desc: Produces power through sunlight.

betterquesting.name: Better Solar Panel
betterquesting.desc: Produces power through sunlight.

betterquesting.name: Demon Steel Tier 1
betterquesting.desc: Aura Cascade may not be here but...

betterquesting.name: Demon Steel Tier 2
betterquesting.desc: Aura Cascade may not be here but...

betterquesting.name: Demon Steel Tier 3
betterquesting.desc: Aura Cascade may not be here but...

betterquesting.desc: Aura Cascade may not be here but...

betterquesting.name: Mekanized Tesseract
betterquesting.desc: Can transfer items, liquids, energy, and gases.

betterquesting.name: PRC
betterquesting.desc: Items made from this machine will be used in the making of reactors.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 1
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 2
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 3
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 4
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 5
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 6
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 7
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 8
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 9
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 10
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: SolarFlux Panel 11
betterquesting.desc: Generator that runs off of sunlight. Increased energy generation rate, internal energy storage, and faster energy transfer rate than the last tier.

betterquesting.name: Sacred Rubber
betterquesting.desc: Chop down rubber trees to gain rubber in order to smelt into plastic.

betterquesting.name: Precision Hammer
betterquesting.desc: Works like a wrench from other mods but this can allow you to see the area some MFR machines are working on.

betterquesting.name: Lava Just Slitherin in
betterquesting.desc: Generates lava when given power.

betterquesting.name: Plant Everything
betterquesting.desc: Plants crops.

betterquesting.name: The Harvest
betterquesting.desc: Harvests crops. Often used with Planter.

betterquesting.name: Sludge Boiler
betterquesting.desc: Produces some useful blocks such as clay after receiving sludge from harvesters. Warning: when active sludgeboiler poisons you.

betterquesting.name: Grinding Away
betterquesting.desc: When supplied with energy, it will kill any mobs in an area 5x5x4 in front of it, producing mob essence each time.

betterquesting.name: Slaughterhouse
betterquesting.desc: Harvest any mob in a 5x5x4m area in front of it and turn it into Meat and Pink Slime.

betterquesting.name: Pink Slime
betterquesting.desc: Produced from the slaughterhouse.

betterquesting.name: Pre Charger
betterquesting.desc: The Laser Drill Precharger is used to power the Laser Drill. On its own it is useless.

betterquesting.name: Lazor Drill
betterquesting.desc: Drill into the void for free ores. Can obtain specific types of ores by using a Laser drill lens of a specific color.

betterquesting.name: Deep Storage
betterquesting.desc: Store mass amounts of one item.

betterquesting.name: Solar Upgraded
betterquesting.desc: Upgrades for solar flux panels.

betterquesting.name: Mangalloy
betterquesting.desc: Steel around redstone.

betterquesting.name: Amp
betterquesting.desc: Quantum component.

betterquesting.name: ZBQ-7
betterquesting.desc: Quantum component.

betterquesting.name: Quibit Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Quantum component.

betterquesting.name: Energized Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Quantum component.

betterquesting.name: Fabrication
betterquesting.desc: Used for other crafting components.

betterquesting.name: Advance Circuit
betterquesting.desc: Quantum component.

betterquesting.name: Power Stash I
betterquesting.desc: Power storage.

betterquesting.name: Power Stash II
betterquesting.desc: Power storage.

betterquesting.name: Power Stash III
betterquesting.desc: Power storage.

betterquesting.name: Power Stash IV
betterquesting.desc: Power storage.

betterquesting.name: Power Stash V
betterquesting.desc: Power storage. Can transfer infinite amopunt of RF.

betterquesting.name: Quantum Storage SSD
betterquesting.desc: Storage Component for the storehouse.

betterquesting.name: Store House
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Imaginary Crop Growth
betterquesting.desc: Supply power to this and pretty much grow crops instantly.

betterquesting.name: Eviscerator
betterquesting.desc: Dig all the things except this thing is kind of slow.

betterquesting.name: Power Armor mk1
betterquesting.desc: Tough armor.

betterquesting.name: Needing an Upgrade
betterquesting.desc: Quantum component.

betterquesting.name: Power Armor mk2
betterquesting.desc: Regular mobs won't be killing you with this armor.

betterquesting.name: Inscriber
betterquesting.desc: The Inscriber is used to press items using various Inscriber Plates.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Inscriber
betterquesting.desc: The Inscriber is used to press items using various Inscriber Plates. This one is more automatable though.

betterquesting.name: Growth Accelerator
betterquesting.desc: Used to accelerate the process of purifying crystals, which allows you to create Pure Certus Quartz Crystal, Pure Nether Quartz Crystal and Pure Fluix Crystal.

betterquesting.name: Growth Chamber
betterquesting.desc: Unnamed questUsed to accelerate the process of purifying crystals, which allows you to create Pure Certus Quartz Crystal, Pure Nether Quartz Crystal and Pure Fluix Crystal within its GUI and can provide regular fluix crystals provided with the materials.

betterquesting.name: Silicon Circuits
betterquesting.desc: Processors made through the inscriber. Cores made with Logic processor.

betterquesting.name: Me Drive
betterquesting.desc: This block holds 10 storage cells so you can tightly pack your storage into a very small space.

betterquesting.name: ME Controllor
betterquesting.desc: The ME Controller is the routing hub of a ME Network. It is not possible to have 2 ME Controller in one ME Network. Multiblock Controllers can be build in a fairly free form, however all ME Controller blocks on a ME Network must be connected, the size of the ME Controller must be within 7x7x7; else it will turn red, and a ME Controller can have 2 adjacent blocks in at most 1 axis; if a block violates this rule, it will disable and turn white.

betterquesting.name: Drive Fixture
betterquesting.desc: A smaller me drive.

betterquesting.name: Crafting GUI
betterquesting.desc: The ME Crafting Terminal is the upgraded version of the ME Terminal which has an integrated crafting grid with access to a ME Network's Networked Storage.

betterquesting.name: Fluid Interface
betterquesting.desc: As the name implies it will interface between the ME Network and fluid storage and transport systems, such as Fluiduct, Tank and Drum.

betterquesting.name: Fluix Cables
betterquesting.desc: Cabling used for ME networks each holds upto 8 channels except the Dense version which holds 32 channels.

betterquesting.name: Pattern GUI
betterquesting.desc: A specialized version of the ME Crafting Terminal designed to encode Blank Patterns into Encoded Pattern. The beginning of Autocrafting.

betterquesting.name: ME Interface
betterquesting.desc: The ME Interface is the only component which can be used as a part, or as a Block. Crafting an ME interface in either form by itself produces the other form. The thin form is useful if you want to provide several different interfaces in a single block of physical space, but each will need its own channel. The block form lets multiple other blocks connect to a single ME interface, using only one channel for the interface.

betterquesting.name: Particle Assembler
betterquesting.desc: The assembler is a powered machine which crafts items, it can be upgraded by inserting Acceleration Cards into it; once upgraded it is very fast. Functions in one of two modes, single pattern mode or interface fed mode.

betterquesting.name: Crafting Units
betterquesting.desc: Is a component of the Crafting CPU. Co-processor: This can be used to make more assemblers active in parallel for the job, and thus increase overall crafting speed. These only help if your setup has steps properly separated so the system can run multiple tasks in parallel, or even split the same pattern across multiple interfaces.

betterquesting.name: Storage Bus
betterquesting.desc: Connect this to chests and such, will allow the me system to look into its inventory.

betterquesting.name: 1K Crafting Unit
betterquesting.desc: Provides 1024 bytes of storage for crafting.

betterquesting.name: Exporter
betterquesting.desc: Takes items out of the ME system.

betterquesting.name: 1K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 1,024 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 1K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 1,024 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 1K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 1,024 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: Spatial IO
betterquesting.desc: Used to capture and deploy regions of space that are defiend by Spatial Pylon.

betterquesting.name: Acceleration Cards
betterquesting.desc: Causes AE mechanisms to process faster than normal.

betterquesting.name: Level Emitter
betterquesting.desc: The ME Level Emitter can indicate either the level of a specified item or the ME Network energy level. You can set the threshold and if the ME Level Emitter will emit a redstone signal or turn it off.

betterquesting.name: Importer
betterquesting.desc: Takes items into the ME system.

betterquesting.name: 2 Degree
betterquesting.desc: Used with Spatial IO Port to store spatial regions.

betterquesting.name: 16 Degree
betterquesting.desc: Used with Spatial IO Port to store spatial regions.

betterquesting.name: 128 Degree
betterquesting.desc: Used with Spatial IO Port to store spatial regions.

betterquesting.name: 4K Crafting Unit
betterquesting.desc: Provides 4,096 bytes of storage for crafting.

betterquesting.name: 16K Crafting Unit
betterquesting.desc: Provides 16,384 bytes of storage for crafting.

betterquesting.name: 64K Crafting Unit
betterquesting.desc: Provides 65,536 bytes of storage for crafting.

betterquesting.name: Fluid Assembler
betterquesting.desc: Crafts with fluids if the recipe calls for aliquid like cake.

betterquesting.name: AE Energy Cell
betterquesting.desc: Storage cell for AE power.

betterquesting.name: AE Dense Energy Cell
betterquesting.desc: Storage cell for more AE Energy.

betterquesting.name: 4K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 4,096 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 4K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 4,096 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 4K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 4,096 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 16K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 16,384 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 64K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 65,536 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 256K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 262,144 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 1024K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 1048576 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 4096K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 4194304 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 16384K ME Storage
betterquesting.desc: 16777216 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 16K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 16,384 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 64K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 65,536 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 256K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 262,144 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 1024K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 1048576 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 4096K Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc: 4194304 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 16K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 16,384 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 64K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 65,536 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 256K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 262,144 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 1024K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 1048576 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: 4096K Gas Storage
betterquesting.desc: 4194304 bytes of storage.

betterquesting.name: Going Wireless
betterquesting.desc: A better Wireless terminal that can do more than just access your AE newtwork.

betterquesting.name: The Start of Worlds
betterquesting.desc: How RFtools begins.

betterquesting.name: Enscriber
betterquesting.desc: Enscribes dimension tabs with specific dimlets of your choosing.

betterquesting.name: Return To Reciever
betterquesting.desc: Will transport the player back to where its connected to, charged porter will make this easier.

betterquesting.name: RF Builder
betterquesting.desc: Builds dimensions using redstoneflux ready to be dialed by the dialer.

betterquesting.name: Dimension Tab
betterquesting.desc: Contains the dimlets ready to be dialed.

betterquesting.name: Return To Sender
betterquesting.desc: Sends player to a dialed RFtools dimension

betterquesting.name: Shard Infuser
betterquesting.desc: Used to enchance machines with dimensional shards.

betterquesting.name: Dimensional Shard
betterquesting.desc: Used to enhance rftools machines.

betterquesting.name: Block Protector
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Modular Storage
betterquesting.desc: Recommend this for all the dimlets you may find.

betterquesting.name: Storage Module
betterquesting.desc: Look at modular storage quest description.

betterquesting.name: Storage Capabilities
betterquesting.desc: Look at modular storage quest description.

betterquesting.name: To The Bug Dimension
betterquesting.desc: Build a portal frame. You can get creative here, any shape will do. Doesn't even need to be vertical! Now fill that baby up with leaves (any leaves should work, even from other mods). Place the keystone in front of the portal then right-click the keystone using your Staff of Gaea.

betterquesting.name: To The Clouds
betterquesting.desc: Make the Aether portal by making a nether shaped portal with glowstone then placing water within it.

betterquesting.name: Tarantuala Brood Mother
betterquesting.desc: The Tarantula Brood Mother Spawns only on the third floor of the Giant Baobab Tree. It spawns in the Subterranean Savannah.

betterquesting.name: Crushroom
betterquesting.desc: The Crushroom is a dangerous hostile mob that spawns in the Fungal Forest.

betterquesting.name: Antlion Overlord
betterquesting.desc: It does not have a second phase like the Brood Mother, but it will never remain stationary and will always be chasing you during the fight. It is STRONGLY recommended that you are well equipped for this boss fight. You have been warned. The Antlion Overlord likes to mess with players who enter its dungeon. Upon entering the dungeon, climb to the top of the pyramid in the middle and you will see four special Pyramid Capstones. They have four distinct types, Mud, Iron, Gold, and Jade, with a slot in the middle of each. These will unlock the pyramid and allow you to enter it. In order to find what opens these slots, seek out the four elemental UmberGolem Idol Guardians found in each corner of the maze surrounding the pyramid. Place each of the idols in their respective slots at the top of the pyramid in the center of the maze to gain access to the inside of the upper floor.

betterquesting.name: Labyrinth
betterquesting.desc: Time for payback for those deaths from another pack.

betterquesting.name: Confirmed: Too Dang Easy
betterquesting.desc: Nostalgia. Warning you may die if you land on these clouds.

betterquesting.name: EMCoin
betterquesting.desc: One coin = 1000 EMCizzle.

betterquesting.name: Minimum Reactor
betterquesting.desc: A multiblock that produces LOADS of power.

betterquesting.name: Cyanite
betterquesting.desc: A byproduct when yellorium is processed through the Big Reactor.

betterquesting.name: Steam Processing
betterquesting.desc: Causes a big reactor to become actively cooled ready to supply steam for the Turbine.

betterquesting.name: Poisonous Reprocessing
betterquesting.desc: Reprocess Cyanite into Blutonium using water.

betterquesting.name: Reprocessed
betterquesting.desc: Reprocessed ingots that is usually used to begin construction of a Turbine.

betterquesting.name: Ludicrite Block
betterquesting.desc: Used for Turbines.

betterquesting.name: Turbine At The Ready
betterquesting.desc: The T2 multiblock that produces LOADS of power, but it can explode if kept over speed for too long.

betterquesting.name: Circuit Wafers
betterquesting.desc: The Circuit Fabricator is a machine block that is used to produce the Blue Solar Wafer, Basic Wafer and the Advanced Wafer.

betterquesting.name: Tier 3 Rocket To Extra Planets
betterquesting.desc: Must use Explosives to take down this Boss.

betterquesting.name: Tier 2 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Evolved Skeleton Boss is the boss mob of the Moon. It can only be found in the Moon Dungeon, in the room before the one that holds the Treasure Chest.

betterquesting.name: Tier 1 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: Once you're ready, you can fly to space, but the rocket can only get you to the spacestation and Moon.

betterquesting.name: NASA
betterquesting.desc: Construct Rockets using schematics.

betterquesting.name: Compressor
betterquesting.desc: The Compressor is a Tier 1 machine block that is used to compress different kinds of ingots and convert them into compressed metal sheets and platings, just being powered by Coal.

betterquesting.name: Electric Compressor
betterquesting.desc: It has the same use as the non-electric Compressor. Its advantage is that it is not necessary to use coal or wood to power it. Instead it has to be powered with energy.

betterquesting.name: Detected
betterquesting.desc: Detects if Oxygen is present in an area.

betterquesting.name: O2 Storage
betterquesting.desc: Store Oxygen for later use.

betterquesting.name: Refinery
betterquesting.desc: The Refinery is a machine block that uses electrical power to process Crude Oil into usable Fuel.

betterquesting.name: Light Up Space
betterquesting.desc: Regular torches won't light in space.

betterquesting.name: Fuel Loader
betterquesting.desc: The Fuel Loader is a machine that is necessary in order to supply fuel to any type of Rocket or to a Moon Buggy.

betterquesting.name: Launch Pad
betterquesting.desc: The Rocket Launch Pad is needed to launch your Spaceship out of the atmosphere in Galacticraft. The Rocket Launch Pad must be placed in a 3 x 3 square to create a functional launch pad.

betterquesting.name: Oxygen Gear
betterquesting.desc: Limited supply of Oxygen to take on those space wallks.

betterquesting.name: O2 Collection
betterquesting.desc: Oxygen Collector is a block that gathers oxygen from leaves and farm plants to use in a Oxygen Bubble Distributor, Oxygen Sealer, Oxygen Compressor, and other oxygen-reliant machines.

betterquesting.name: O2 Sealer
betterquesting.desc: The Oxygen Sealer is a machine that fills a room with oxygen (although the oxygen is generally not visible) up to around 800-1000 blocks (amount stacks with multiple sealers within close proximity) allowing the user to breathe without Oxygen Gear.

betterquesting.name: Out The Airlock
betterquesting.desc: Air Lock is an airtight door used to provide a passage between enclosed rooms and between an enclosed room and outer space. It is made from Air Lock Frames and one Air Lock Controller.

betterquesting.name: Desh
betterquesting.desc: The ore comes from Mars.

betterquesting.name: Say Cheese, CHEESE
betterquesting.desc: Cheese ore from the moon.

betterquesting.name: Cryo Sleep
betterquesting.desc: The only way to sleep in space.

betterquesting.name: Timeless Satellite
betterquesting.desc: 16 Aluminum Ingots32 Tin Ingots24 Iron Ingots1 Advanced Wafer.

betterquesting.name: Tier 4 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Tier 4 Rocket Schematic can be found in Tier 4 treasure chests, found after completing the Venus Dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Tier 5 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Tier 5 Rocket Schematic can be found in Tier 5 treasure chests, found after completing the Jupiter Dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Tier 6 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Tier 6 Rocket Schematic can be found in Tier 6 treasure chests, found after completing the Saturn Dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Tier 7 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Tier 7 Rocket Schematic can be found in Tier 7 treasure chests, found after completing the Uranus Dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Tier 8 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Tier 8 Rocket Schematic can be found in Tier 8 treasure chests, found after completing the Neptune Dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Tier 9 Rocket
betterquesting.desc: The Tier 9 Rocket Schematic can be found in Tier 9 treasure chests, found after completing the Pluto Dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Philosopher's Stone
betterquesting.desc: The gateway to alchemy itself.

betterquesting.name: Fuel For Days
betterquesting.desc: Compounds that possess a higher capability for serving as a fuel than most other mundane substances.

betterquesting.name: Transmute
betterquesting.desc: By placing items into the fire slot on the table, they are burned into EMC, which can then be used to create items from the output slots. However, the table must gain knowledge on how to create these items. The table gains knowledge whenever an item enters any of its slots.

betterquesting.name: Alchemical Chest
betterquesting.desc: Alchemical Chest capable of storing 104 stacks of items, compared to the double wooden chest's 72 stacks.

betterquesting.name: Dark Matters
betterquesting.desc: Created with eight aeternalis fuel and one diamond block.

betterquesting.name: Red Matters
betterquesting.desc: Crafted with six aeternalis fuel and three dark matter.

betterquesting.name: Energy Condensed
betterquesting.desc: This first build converts items into EMC one at a time. When enough EMC amasses, the target item is created and placed in the chest.

betterquesting.name: Energy Converter
betterquesting.desc: Faster than the mk.1 energy condenser.

betterquesting.name: Alchemical Bag
betterquesting.desc: The bags seem to be bound to some metaphysical network, as all bags of the same color seem to contain the same items, regardless of if the bag was yours or your neighbor's. The bag also seems to activate items the same way the chest does.

betterquesting.name: Morning Star
betterquesting.desc: A really powerful red matter multitool that can dig really large holes.

betterquesting.name: Katar
betterquesting.desc: A really powerful red matter multitool that can take down enemies in an area of effect.

betterquesting.name: Destruction Catalyst
betterquesting.desc: The Mobius fuel will create such energy that it will melt 3x3 blocks in front of you. You can charge it so that it will melt farther but this will come at a cost of extra fuel in your inventory.

betterquesting.name: Transmute Part 2
betterquesting.desc: Portable EMC table.

betterquesting.name: SRG
betterquesting.desc: By jumping twice, the ring will let you fly. This does use energy. Right clicking will activate a magical wind storm around you that will push away mobs. Beware that this also requires energy.

betterquesting.name: Dr. Klein Star
betterquesting.desc: Ancient records suggest that it can not only hold the light of the stars, but the essence of the earth too. Four of them fit together like puzzle pieces to create an even bigger and more powerful star.

betterquesting.name: Evolution
betterquesting.desc: Beginning of the Evolution. It is used to craft various items from the mod.

betterquesting.name: Wyvern Armor
betterquesting.desc: Greatly increased resistance to damage compared to its counterpart made out of Diamonds

betterquesting.name: Fluxed Capacity
betterquesting.desc: A portable energy cell which can store 80M RF with the ability to charge other items in your inventory directly.

betterquesting.name: Draconic Core
betterquesting.desc: It can be used as a crafting component to create other items from the mod. The item also has the ability to stabilize Monster Spawners, turning them into Stabilized Mob Spawners. This is done by simply using the Draconic Core on a Monster Spawner block.

betterquesting.name: Wyvern Core
betterquesting.desc: It is a crafting component used to create other items from the mod. Requires nether star.

betterquesting.name: Awakened Core
betterquesting.desc: It is used as a component to craft some of the most advanced items from the mod.

betterquesting.name: Chaos Core
betterquesting.desc: It is used as a component to craft some of the most advanced items from Draconic Evolution and Avaritia.

betterquesting.name: Resurrection Ritual
betterquesting.desc: Read Draconic Evolution information tablet for this ritual. Dragon will get harder each time its slain.

betterquesting.name: Chaos Guardian
betterquesting.desc: Destroy the Chaos Crystals in order to deal any damage to the Chaos Guardian unless you have a...

betterquesting.name: Chaos Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Once the Chaos crystal is shattered...run/fly away.

betterquesting.name: Charged
betterquesting.desc: Draconium block charged full of RF.

betterquesting.name: Awakening Ritual
betterquesting.desc: Read Draconic Evolution information tablet for this ritual.

betterquesting.name: Reapers
betterquesting.desc: Gain the Reaper enchantment to begin collecting mob souls.

betterquesting.name: Charm of Relocation
betterquesting.desc: It is a tool which the player can bind to a specific location to which they can then teleport by using the charm. Consumes ender pearls.

betterquesting.name: Fluxed Capacitor
betterquesting.desc: A portable energy cell which can store 250M RF with the ability to charge other items in your inventory directly. Recommend having at least 2 of these for Chaos Guardian.

betterquesting.name: Dragon Armor
betterquesting.desc: It is an upgrade of the Wyvern set, which is charged with Redstone Flux energy on top of the high resistance to damage of the Wyvern Helm.

betterquesting.name: Upgraded Evolution
betterquesting.desc: Uses the first 3 draconic cores to enhance Draconic Armor and Wyvern Armor.

betterquesting.name: Staff of Power
betterquesting.desc: A powerful multi purpose tool that has a mining range of effect of 11 up to 99. It has an internal energy buffer of 30M RF. The Staff gives a bonus damage on a direct hit to a mob with health more than 10 hearts and it delivers a damaging shock wave to any mob in the area of effect (default of 33).

betterquesting.name: Matrix
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: 81 Crafting
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Primeval Brew
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Neutron Collection
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help. Slowly generates piles of neutronium.

betterquesting.name: Neutron Compressor
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help. Creates singularities.

betterquesting.name: Iron Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Silver Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Tin Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Shiny Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Mithril Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Lumium Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Enderium Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Diamond Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Emerald Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Steel Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Sapphire Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Electrotine Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Titanium Singularity
betterquesting.desc: NEI will help.

betterquesting.name: Sword of the Cosmos
betterquesting.desc: AKA the Infinity Sword, can one-shot the Chaos Guardian without taking out the towers and can kill other players wearing Infinity Armor/Armour.

betterquesting.name: Infinity Armor/Armour
betterquesting.desc: Armor/Armour that ignores damage from every source including the /kill command, but excluding the Sword of the Cosmos if doing PvP.

betterquesting.name: "Simple" Achievements
betterquesting.desc: This isn't the end.

betterquesting.name: Alpha
betterquesting.desc: The Beginning: Ex Nihilo, Immersive Engineering, Ex Astris Rebirth, Magneticraft, Tinkers' Construct.

betterquesting.name: Beta
betterquesting.desc: Botania, Agricraft, and Magical Crops.

betterquesting.name: Gamma
betterquesting.desc: Extra Utilities and Buildcraft

betterquesting.name: Delta
betterquesting.desc: Thermal Foundation/Expansion/Dynamics and Ender IO.

betterquesting.name: Epsilon
betterquesting.desc: Pneumaticraft and Mekanism

betterquesting.name: Zeta
betterquesting.desc: SolarFlux, QuantumFlux, and Minefactory Reloaded.

betterquesting.name: Eta
betterquesting.desc: Applied Energistics

betterquesting.name: Theta
betterquesting.desc: RFTools, Erebus, and Aether.

betterquesting.name: Iota
betterquesting.desc: Big Reactors and Galacticraft.

betterquesting.name: Kappa
betterquesting.desc: ProjectE

betterquesting.name: Lambda
betterquesting.desc: Draconic Evolution

betterquesting.name: Mu
betterquesting.desc: Avaritia

betterquesting.name: Nu
betterquesting.desc: The End: "Simple" Achievements
